original_text: Then some Jews arrived there in Lystra. They had travelled from Antioch and from Iconium. They talked to the people, so that they turned against Paul. Then these Jews threw stones at Paul to kill him. They pulled his body to outside the town. They thought that he was dead.
korean_text: 유대인들이 안디옥과 이고니온에서 와서 무리를 충동하니 그들이 돌로 바울을 쳐서 죽은 줄로 알고 시외로 끌어 내치니라

sentences.original_text: Then some Jews arrived there in Lystra.
sentences.korean_translation: 그러자 어떤 유대인들이 루스tra에 그곳에 도착했습니다.

sentences.original_text: so that they turned against Paul.
Then these Jews threw stones at Paul
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 이 유대인들은 바울에게 돌을 던졌습니다

sentences.original_text: They pulled his body to outside the town.
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 그의 시체를 성 밖으로 끌고 갔습니다.

sentences.original_text: They thought that he was dead.
